start.text: It is now open season on buckheads.
Let us get this safari moving.
Check your weapons. The game, she is afoot.

start_boss.text: Let us make this hunt more of a challenge.

retreat.text: I am not liking this failure. It is not something I ever wish to speak of.

engaged.text: Do you know how long a man can survive without his skin?
Got a view to a kill here.
This will be so easy I am already bored with it.
There are a lot of trophies to be had from all these buckheads.

need_help.text: This position. It is not good.

pursuing.text: This is how I approach the kill.
No living thing shall escape my notice.

running.text: Be sure you do not become prey.

hull_50.text: Ah, this scar will be magnifique!

hull_30.text: Merde! I fear my head, she will be mounted on someone's wall soon!

overload.text: I should be killing buckhead instead of being stuck with this.
You insult me. How can I hunt using trash such as this?

death.text: This is the end of the hunt... I wonder what my head will look like mounted on a wall.

victory.text: The buckheads are all dead. Time to take trophies.
If there is a fedora, it is mine.
Another trophy to add to my collection.

victory_boss.text: Now this is what I call hunting!
